alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 02 at 1:31PM MDT until August 02 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS, OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM... .Storms are expected this afternoon and evening so a Red Flag Warning continues for the Southern Highlands, Twin Falls BLM, and the Owyhee Mountains. In addition, a Red Flag Warning is now in effect from Thursday afternoon through Friday evening for all but the NF districts, again due to scattered thunderstorms. This replaces the Fire Weather Watch that had previously been issued. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423... 424 AND 426... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THURSDAY TO 11 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423... 424 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM Thursday to 11 PM MDT Friday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts to 50 mph possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
